TopicTitle: I think ksp2 bricked my system

Articles.Content: So I had just started my game and I launched a place that I had made and before I could take off the game froze for a few seconds and my pc just shut down. It tried to start up a few times but now it’s on a screen that says “ preparing automatic repair” but it’s frozen. I’ve tried to reboot it manually but the same thing happens. My pc should 100% be able to run this game. It ran the old version before the patch. I think the patch might have broken something and now my pc refuses to work. Any help would be super appreciated.

Hi, I have had similar before when a windows update screwed it up.

Have you tried safe mode with networking ? Could from there if it boots is try system restore or repair.
